attributes.action: I would like to petition for an early 2016 Referendum on the European Union
attributes.additional_details: I am ashamed of the way my fellow patriots have been lied to over the European Union. I remember when it was called the common market, what happened? We the people never voted for the EU. We the people never voted to give our rights and freedoms away to other countries. We the people need to stop this dictatorship and put the Great back into Great Britain
attributes.background: As a mother and grandmother of this once great nation, I am afraid for my family and my future generations. This is not the country I grew up in. I was proud to call England my home. I don't recognise my home anymore. The EU has taken my hopes and dreams for the future and threw them away

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104838

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
